all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Let them repent of all their sins, and of all their covetous desires, before me, saith the Lord; for what is property unto me? saith the Lord.
Doctrine and Covenants 117:4
Quote of the Day
"As followers of Jesus Christ, we should seek to emulate the way our Master demonstrated His pure love for others."
Elder Michael B. Strong | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
